biography: Born 18 September 1845; died 26 September 1919. In 1869, Chauffourier was active as a photographer in Palermo, Italy, in association with another photographer named Perron. In 1870, Chauffourier was photographing in Naples, Italy. Chauffourier established a studio in Rome, Italy, ca. 1871. In 1884, Chauffourier obtained permission to travel as an itinerant photographer in Austria, Serbia, Romania, Bulgaria, Turkey and Russia. He returned and settled in Naples, Italy, in 1894 (ULAN).
